Бегаешь рубишь ракалов направо налево. P.s. осуждаю фонарики, карается жестоко!!!

This game can be rough around the edges at times, as many will point out. The real take-away though is that these same people keep coming back to the game and playing for hours similar to mine. It just has a quality that other asymmetrical horror games can't seem to grasp. 

Balance is sketchy at times, but it's largely due to the active and continued development of the game and introductions of new mechanics/functionalities from the hoard of IP's that the devs have been able to secure. 

What I've typed almost feels like product placement to me as I read it but this game presents me a feeling that I've only ever gotten from games like World of Warcraft. You might venture into other games of the same genre, but they never quite feel like they scratches the itch that Dead by Daylight creates.
Listen to what the community wants?? NA add another skin for people to buy with real money...

Too survivor sided to be able to be called a horror game, developers clearly do not play or care about the game and the community is as toxic if not more than league of legends.

I think they did a pretty bad job so far.

Bought this years ago, never got into it until years later. Game sucks, it's like R6 Siege except instead of being called the n-word in game chat I get to enjoy being matched with cross-platform players who either have TTV in their names or don't know how to play video games. It's great with friends, but you still end up wanting to scream at various points of the day with how little love and attention this company actually gives this game. Totally recommend it for casual play with friends when it's on sale for like 3-7 dollars but I'd never pay full price for this unless you genuinely feel like a sadomasochist with a hard-on for being diddled by a video game
